project-description.title: What is this project?
project-description.what-is-it: Using this tool you can view the colaborations your favorite artist has done on spotify.
project-description.authors: Authors: Filipe Tressmann and Lais Nuto.
project-description.course-reference: This is a project done for the course <link1>MAC0350</link1> in IME-USP.

artist-input.description: Write the names of two artists to see the common collaborations between them
artist-input.label1: Write the name of the first artist
artist-input.label2: Write the name of the second artist
